description: This file defines a Flutter widget for displaying a list of birthdays, with the ability to add new ones via a dialog. It uses provider for state management and imports specific models, widgets, and providers relevant to the birthday feature.

classes.name: BirthdaysScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the birthdays list screen, displaying existing birthdays and providing a button to add new ones.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the birthdays screen, including app bar, list of birthdays, and add button.
